attributes.action: Ban the hunting and killing of foxes as well as wolves
attributes.additional_details:
Foxes don’t have anywhere else to go except cities or towns because humans have taken over their habitat instead.
Due to this, I don’t see how you can justify any excuse for killing a fox simply because it was on supposedly ‘your land’ especially since it was their first.
We have to co-exist with the species of the earth and learn to share more with the animals instead of cold heartedly and mindlessly killing them!
attributes.background:
Ban the use of firearms or hunting of animals such as wolves or foxes.
No harm should come to those creatures and they should not be allowed to be killed or slaughter! 
It should be illegal!

rejection.details: There are no wild wolves resident in England, but we could accept a petition calling for changes to existing rules on protecting property from damage from foxes, which you can read here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/foxes-moles-and-mink-how-to-protect-your-property-from-damage
